# UIFocusHeading

**Structure**

The general type of an event.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIFocusHeading
```

## Overview

You obtain the direction of the focus from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusUpdateContext/focusHeading] property.

## Constants

- **up**: The focus update is heading in the up direction.
- **down**: The focus update is heading in the down direction.
- **left**: The focus update is heading in the left direction.
- **right**: The focus update is heading in the right direction.
- **next**: The focus update is heading to the next item.
- **previous**: The focus update is heading to the previous item.
- **first**: The focus update is heading to the first item.
- **last**: The focus update is heading to the last item.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a focus heading structure with the specified raw value.

## Locating focus direction

- **previouslyFocusedView**: The view that was focused before the focus update.
- **nextFocusedView**: The view that takes the focus after the focus update.
- **focusHeading**: The heading in which the focus update is occurring.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
